      • issue_Identification

        public void issue_Identification(java.lang.String x,
                                 java.lang.String y)
        Identify the issue. This function converts the facts into perception using classification, perception is then converted into hypothesis using Assessment, hypothesis is converted into directive using resolution, resolution is converted into fact using enactment.
        Parameters:
        x - Issue Ticket id URI
        y - Feature URI

      • issue_verification

        y - Feature URI

      • if_exist_KI

        public static java.lang.String if_exist_KI(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model m,
                                           java.lang.String p,
                                           java.lang.String c1,
                                           java.lang.String c2)
        Checks if there is already a known issue to the incident ticket.
        Parameters:
        m - Known issue model
        p - Product which has issue (Ms Office)
        c1 - Sub category1 (Ms Word)
        c2 - Sub category2 (ctrl+v, ctrl+c does not work)
        Returns:
        The issue which has attributes product p, sub cat1 c1, sub cat2 c2
